Package MOBLIMA

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • MOBLIMA.View
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MOBLIMA, ViewAccount, ViewAdminMenu, ViewCustomerMenu, ViewLogin, ViewPrice, ViewSystem
    public abstract class View
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a view on the console. This is an abstract class which will be inherited by other views. It has built-in methods like clearScreen(). Every view must implement a menu with an access level.
    Since:
    2019-11-13
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    SS1 Group 2

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      View()  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clearScreen​(java.lang.String directory, AccessLevel accessLevel)
      Clears the screen of the console and prints the header of the view.
      abstract void menu​(AccessLevel accessLevel)
      A menu display which must be implemented by all views.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public View()

    • Method Detail

      • clearScreen

        public void clearScreen​(java.lang.String directory,
                        AccessLevel accessLevel)
        Clears the screen of the console and prints the header of the view.
        Parameters:
        directory - the current directory which will be printed
        accessLevel - the access level, customer or administrator

      • menu

        public abstract void menu​(AccessLevel accessLevel)
        A menu display which must be implemented by all views.
        Parameters:
        accessLevel - the access level, customer or administrator
